channel.title: Demolitionx 711
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i1103.photobucket.com/albums/g472/707sm/Demolitionx/null090424AM.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1103.photobucket.com/albums/g472/707sm/Demolitionx/null091532AM.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1103.photobucket.com/albums/g472/707sm/Demolitionx/null090049AM.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1103.photobucket.com/albums/g472/707sm/Demolitionx/null095435AM.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1103.photobucket.com/albums/g472/707sm/Demolitionx/null10.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1103.photobucket.com/albums/g472/707sm/Demolitionx/null093909AM.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1103.photobucket.com/albums/g472/707sm/Demolitionx/null093415AM.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1103.photobucket.com/albums/g472/707sm/Demolitionx/null093336AM.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1103.photobucket.com/albums/g472/707sm/Demolitionx/null093316AM.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1103.photobucket.com/albums/g472/707sm/Demolitionx/null093236AM.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1103.photobucket.com/albums/g472/707sm/Demolitionx/null093209AM.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1103.photobucket.com/albums/g472/707sm/Demolitionx/null093001AM.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1103.photobucket.com/albums/g472/707sm/Demolitionx/null092911AM.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1103.photobucket.com/albums/g472/707sm/Demolitionx/null092812AM.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1103.photobucket.com/albums/g472/707sm/Demolitionx/null092745AM.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1103.photobucket.com/albums/g472/707sm/Demolitionx/null092504AM.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1103.photobucket.com/albums/g472/707sm/Demolitionx/null092414AM.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1103.photobucket.com/albums/g472/707sm/Demolitionx/null092301AM.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1103.photobucket.com/albums/g472/707sm/Demolitionx/null092147AM.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1103.photobucket.com/albums/g472/707sm/Demolitionx/null091851AM.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1103.photobucket.com/albums/g472/707sm/Demolitionx/null091650AM.png[/img] Hey guys I know I started this project before but the person that was hosting the server only cared about money and deleted every single one of my files. I am now restarting with a 667/711 base. I will be starting today on beta mode not completely hosting just to change around and code a bit in the source. This source is not even close to being able to be hosted I have several things I need to edit and am requiring some help on the project. I will have an ongoing update log below, as for now I will post current features of the server.
I currently only want [size=10pt]one[/size] more developer on the team.
Our current release date estimate will be: [size=12pt]UNKOWN[/size]
To apply for the team fill this out please: Name: Age: Time Zone: Time in java (Must be at least 1 year): Experience (PROOF PLEASE):
Our current forums are: NEED APPROVAL
[size=15pt]Update Log[/size] [code] 6/9/12- Added Mystery Boxes With Many Possibilities http://screencast.com/t/b6i2h0323N 6/10/12- Added Flawless Dicing http://screencast.com/t/5L29VhvM 6/11/12- Fixed Armadyl Staff- Fixed Polypore- Fixed TokHaar-Kal Cape- Fixed Economy 6/13/12- New shops 6/14/12- Added Glacors 6/15/12- Added Jad 6/16/12- Added Nomad 6/17/12- Added Tokens 6/18/12- Added Summoning - Added Full Trade - Added Donor Zone - Fixed Train Area - DFS Is Fixed - Fixed Up Castle Wars 6/19/12- Fixed Auras 100% - Fixed Duel To 100% - Added Lottery System With Lottie - Added RFD - Added Troll Invasion - Added Zombies - Added FightPits - Added FightCaves Jad 65 Waves! - Added Dummy Hitting - Worked On Clan Wars Base - Worked on "war"[/code]
[size=12pt]Features From Before My Involvement:[/size] [code] 1>Farming,Mining,Woodcutting,Crafting,Herblore and Rares shop 2>Taken out Starter tutorial so you don't get 99's 3>Added a 500k cash starter 4>Made R.S Webclient look 5>item command only for players whit the privilege not for admins/mods or normal players [/code]
[size=12pt]Features From After My Involvement:[/size] [code] - Added Mystery Boxes With Many Possibilities http://screencast.com/t/b6i2h0323N - Added Flawless Dicing http://screencast.com/t/5L29VhvM - Fixed Armadyl Staff- Fixed Polypore- Fixed TokHaar-Kal Cape- Fixed Economy - New shops - Added Glacors - Added Jad - Added Nomad - Added Tokens - Added Summoning - Added Full Trade - Added Donor Zone - Fixed Train Area - DFS Is Fixed - Fixed Up Castle Wars - Fixed Auras 100% - Fixed Duel To 100% - Added Lottery System With Lottie - Added RFD - Added Troll Invasion - Added Zombies - Added FightPits - Added FightCaves Jad 65 Waves! - Added Dummy Hitting - Worked On Clan Wars Base - Worked on "war"[/code]

item.title: Demolitionx 711
item.dc:creator: @Demolitionx711 Demolitionx711
item.description:
@Demolitionx711 wrote:






















Hey guys I know I started this project before but the person that was hosting the server only cared about money and deleted every single one of my files. I am now restarting with a 667/711 base. I will be starting today on beta mode not completely hosting just to change around and code a bit in the source. This source is not even close to being able to be hosted I have several things I need to edit and am requiring some help on the project.
I will have an ongoing update log below, as for now I will post current features of the server.

I currently only want [size=10pt]one[/size] more developer on the team.

Our current release date estimate will be: [size=12pt]UNKOWN[/size]

To apply for the team fill this out please:
Name:
Age:
Time Zone:
Time in java (Must be at least 1 year):
Experience (PROOF PLEASE):

Our current forums are: NEED APPROVAL

[size=15pt]Update Log[/size]

6/9/12- Added Mystery Boxes With Many Possibilities http://screencast.com/t/b6i2h0323N 6/10/12- Added Flawless Dicing http://screencast.com/t/5L29VhvM 6/11/12- Fixed Armadyl Staff- Fixed Polypore- Fixed TokHaar-Kal Cape- Fixed Economy 6/13/12- New shops 6/14/12- Added Glacors 6/15/12- Added Jad 6/16/12- Added Nomad 6/17/12- Added Tokens 6/18/12- Added Summoning - Added Full Trade - Added Donor Zone - Fixed Train Area - DFS Is Fixed - Fixed Up Castle Wars 6/19/12- Fixed Auras 100% - Fixed Duel To 100% - Added Lottery System With Lottie - Added RFD - Added Troll Invasion - Added Zombies - Added FightPits - Added FightCaves Jad 65 Waves! - Added Dummy Hitting - Worked On Clan Wars Base - Worked on "war"

[size=12pt]Features From Before My Involvement:[/size]

1>Farming,Mining,Woodcutting,Crafting,Herblore and Rares shop
2>Taken out Starter tutorial so you don't get 99's
3>Added a 500k cash starter
4>Made R.S Webclient look
5>item command only for players whit the privilege not for admins/mods or normal players

[size=12pt]Features From After My Involvement:[/size]

[code]

  • Added Mystery Boxes With Many Possibilities http://screencast.com/t/b6i2h0323N
  • Added Flawless Dicing http://screencast.com/t/5L29VhvM
  • Fixed Armadyl Staff- Fixed Polypore- Fixed TokHaar-Kal Cape- Fixed Economy
  • New shops
  • Added Glacors
  • Added Jad
  • Added Nomad
  • Added Tokens
  • Added Summoning
  • Added Full Trade
  • Added Donor Zone
  • Fixed Train Area
  • DFS Is Fixed
  • Fixed Up Castle Wars
  • Fixed Auras 100%
    - Fixed Duel To 100%
    - Added Lottery System With Lottie
    - Added RFD
    - Added Troll Invasion
    - Added Zombies
    - Added FightPits
    - Added FightCaves Jad 65 Waves!
    - Added Dummy Hitting
    - Worked On Clan Wars Base
    - Worked on “war”[/code]
